segments.text: Looking at the boy on the stool, I feel a sense of fear.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretching to reach the cookie jar, completely unaware of the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks so unstable, like it could tip over any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe the woman hasn't noticed what he's doing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's so focused on the cookies, oblivious to the risk of falling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a knot in my stomach, hoping he doesn't get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl next to him seems to be encouraging his actions, adding to the tension.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they've done this before, sneaking cookies without permission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene is filled with a sense of impending accident, making me anxious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just want to step in and steady the stool, to prevent any mishaps.
segments.speaker: PAR
